metadata.physical_appearance: "The image shows a movie projector that is placed inside an open box. The box is made of wood and the words, ""Lishing Products St. Louis
metadata.subject_terms_1: Missouri"" and the logo of the firm are displayed on the interior of the case cover. There are cables attached to the movie projector. There are numerous knobs and levers situated on the body of the projector. The spool of the projector is located to the left of the projector frame."
